summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Southwest Forney Street from 49th Ave. Southwest to 51st Ave. Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing a sanitary sewer system and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18796 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
